name: 1.30.1: Maintenance release
body:
Update build environment and dependencies:

* compile and target api level 29
* gradle: 5.5.1 -> 5.6.2
* android gradle plugin: 3.4.2 -> 3.5.1
* ~jacoco: 0.8.4 - 0.8.5~
* ben-manes: 0.22.0 -> 0.27.0
* robolectric: 4.3 -> 4.3.1
* kotlin: 1.3.41 -> 1.3.50
* kotlin coroutines: 1.2.2 -> 1.3.2
* androidx:
  - appcompat: 1.0.2 -> 1.1.0
  - lifecycle: 2.0.0 -> 2.1.0
  - preference: 1.0.0 -> 1.1.0
  - room: 2.1.0 -> 2.2.0

name: 1.30.0: Maintenance release
body: Update build environment and dependencies

name: 1.29.1: Update build environment and fix autobackup
body:
* Update build environment:
  - agp: 3.3.0 -> 3.4.0
  - kotlin: 1.3.20 -> 1.3.30
  - kotlin coroutines: 1.1.1 -> 1.2.0
  - dagger: 2.21 -> 2.22.1
  - robolectric: 4.1 -> 4.2.1
  - ben manes: 0.20.0 -> 0.21.0
  - dexcount: 0.8.5 -> 0.8.6
* Fix issue #164: make autobackup work for settings and the user db

name: 1.29.0: Maintenance release, improve audio export
body:
* Update build environment:
  - agp: 3.2.1 -> 3.3.0
  - jacoco: 0.8.2 -> 0.8.3
  - dexcount: 0.8.4 -> 0.8.5
  - kotlin: 1.3.11 -> 1.3.20
  - kotlin coroutines: 1.1.0 -> 1.1.1
  - dagger: 2.20 -> 2.21
  - leak-canary: 1.6.2 -> 1.6.3
* Improve audio export: show the share intent directly (bypassing the notification) if the app is visible
* Fix Android Studio code inspection issues

name: 1.28.0: maintenance, bug fixes, minor UI improvement
body:
* Update to androidx
* Remove deprecated code and resources which were relevant only for KitKat and older
* Rename the "Reader" tab to "Composer" and change the icon to a pencil icon
* Fix issues with the dark theme on newer devices (Oreo+)

name: 1.26.7: Update environment (big update)
body:
compileSdkVersion: 27 -> 28
buildToolsVerison: 28.0.1 -> 28.0.3
tagetSdkVersion: 27 -> 28
agp: 3.1.3 -> 3.2.1
gradle: 4.8.1 -> 4.10.2
support lib: 27.1.1 -> 28.0.0

kotlin: 1.2.51 -> 1.3.0
kotlin coroutines: 0.23.4 -> 1.0.1

jacoco: 0.8.1 -> 0.8.2
dexcount: 0.8.3 -> 0.8.4
robolectroc: 3.8 -> 4.0.2
leak canary: 1.5.4 -> 1.6.2

constraintlayout: 1.1.2 -> 1.1.3
dagger: 2.16 -> 2.19

----

* Remove the prefs lib (it conflicted with dagger)
* Migrate kotlin code to new coroutines
* Fix code inspection issues for kotlin
* Fix tab icons (they weren't being displayed properly because of https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/117745810

name: 1.26.8: rollback to 1.26.6
body: Identical to 1.26.6. This is a rollback a bad 1.26.7 build which was pushed to beta.

name: 1.27.0: settings icon, stop JellyBean/KitKat
body:
* Add icons to settings screen
* Discontinue support for jellybean and kitkat

name: 1.27.1 Correct margins in the settings screen.
1.26.5: Maintenance release
body:
* Update build environment.
  - agp: 3.1.0 -> 3.1.2
  - kotlin: 1.2.31 -> 1.2.40
  - constraint layout: 1.0.2 -> 1.1.0
  - test runner: 1.0.2-alpha1 -> 1.0.2
  - espresso: 3.0.1 -> 3.0.2
* Use ListAdapter instead of RecyclerView.Adapter

name: 1.26.4 - Maintenance and bug fix release
body:
* Update build environment.
  - jacoco: 0.8.0 -> 0.8.1
  - robolectric: 3.6.1 -> 3.8
  - arch components: 1.1.0 -> 1.1.1
  - dagger: 2.14.1 -> 2.15
  - agp: 3.0.1 -> 3.1.0
  - kotlin: 1.2.21 -> 1.2.31
  - coroutines: 0.22.1 -> 0.22.5
  - support lib: 27.0.2 -> 27.1.1
* Fix at least one case of issue 140, where the player only read empty text.

name: 1.26.2: Crash fixes after Kotlin migration.
body:
Issue #134: Fix crash when copying word to clipboard
Issue #136: Fix crash when searching then rotating.

name: 1.26.3: Maintenance release.
body:
Maintenance release: update build environment:
* android-arch: 1.0.0 -> 1.1.0
* kotlin: 1.2.10 -> 1.2.21
* kotlin coroutines: 0.21 -> 0.22.1

name: 1.26.1: Update the min sdk to 16
body: ICS users will have to use version 1.25.0, due to issue #133

name: 1.26.0: Rewrite in Kotlin
body:
- Complete rewrite of the app in Kotlin.
  - Replace RxJava schedulers with Kotlin coroutines.

name: 1.25.1: Attempt to fix a crash related to the search view hint.
1.25.0: Save last tab
body:
* Open the app in the last tab the user had selected.
* Update to support library 27.0.1

* Add word and character count.
* Migrate data classes to Kotlin.
* Fix access to system TTS settings.

name: 1.23.0: Added setting to include reverse lookups in thesaurus searches.
1.22.3: Maintenance release
body:
Update build environment:
* jacoco 0.7.9
* target 27
* rxjava 2.1.6
* robolectric 3.5.1

name: 1.22.2: Maintenance release (LiveData)
body:
* Replace `Loader`s, `EventBus` and some `ObservableField`s with `LiveData`.
* Upgrade environment: android gradle plugin 3.0.0, support library 27, compileSdkVersion 27.

name: 1.22.1: Fix crash sharing text or looking up a word on the web.
1.22.0: Text selection lookup setting and android architecture components
body:
* Add setting to toggle lookups from text selection.
* Maintenance: use the android viewmodel and room architecture components.

* Add setting for the priority of the word of the day notification.
* Add favorites import/export function in the settings screen.

name: 1.20.0: Rhymer settings and Android O compatibility
body:
* Add settings to consider some different vowel sounds as identical for rhyming.
* Make the app compatible with Android O.

name: 1.19.0: added function to print the poem
1.18.5: Pause playback with "..."
body: Added possibility to pause playback by typing "..." in the poem text. Currently only works for playback, not when saving the poem to an audio file.
